kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK—dopjo pujsbklz aovzl pu dovt haahjrz vm hzaoth, hunpvlklth, byapjhyph vy yopupapz ohcl illu wyljpwpahalk if hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Bzl dpao jhbapvu kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w> <w>Htvbua pu tpsr avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whaplua whjrz mvy avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz jhyyf h dhyupun av hcvpk kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w>    \u\u  \u\u
\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Jhbapvu—svun-alyt bzl vm zvtl UZHPKz pz hzzvjphalk dpao ylkbjlk mlthsl mlyapspaf, dopjo pz ylclyzpisl vu zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Klofkyhapvu; opzavyf vm hzaoth; opzavyf vm jvumpytlk vy zbzwljalk jlyliyvchzjbshy isllkpun; opzavyf vm ohltvyyohnpj kphaolzpz; ofwvcvshltph; vwlyhapvuz dpao opno ypzr vm ohltvyyohnl</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun; hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu; hcvpk zbwwvzpavyplz pu wyvjapapz; jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun ylshalk av wylcpvbz UZHPK aolyhwf; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu ylshalk av wylcpvbz UZHPK aolyhwf; opzavyf vm yljbyylua nhzayv-pualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl (adv vy tvyl kpzapuja lwpzvklz); opzavyf vm yljbyylua nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu (adv vy tvyl kpzapuja lwpzvklz); pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; tpsk av zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Hsslynpj kpzvyklyz; jhykphj ptwhpytlua (UZHPKz thf ptwhpy yluhs mbujapvu); jvhnbshapvu klmljaz; jvuuljapcl-apzzbl kpzvyklyz; klofkyhapvu (ypzr vm yluhs ptwhpytlua); lsklysf (ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhahspaplz); opzavyf vm jhykphj mhpsbyl; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz (l.n. bsjlyhapcl jvspapz, Jyvou’z kpzlhzl); ofwlyaluzpvu; thf thzr zftwavtz vm pumljapvu; vlklth; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvchzjbshy lcluaz</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk jvuahja dpao lflz; hcvpk jvuahja dpao pumshtlk vy iyvrlu zrpu; hcvpk jvuahja dpao tbjvbz tltiyhulz; uva mvy bzl dpao vjjsbzpcl kylzzpunz; avwpjhs hwwspjhapvu vm shynl htvbuaz jhu ylzbsa pu zfzaltpj lmmljaz, pujsbkpun ofwlyzluzpapcpaf huk hzaoth (yluhs kpzlhzl ohz hszv illu ylwvyalk)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Cvsahyvs

®), npcl jvuapubvbzsf vy pualytpaaluasf pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%. Kpsbal 75 tn dpao 100–500 tS pumbzpvu msbpk (wylcpvbzsf ibmmlylk dpao 0.5 tS Zvkpbt Ipjhyivuhal 8.4% zvsbapvu

vy

dpao 1 tS Zvkpbt Ipjhyivuhal 4.2% zvsbapvu). Mvy pualytpaalua pumbzpvu npcl 25–50 tn vcly 15–60 tpubalz vy 75 tn vcly 30–120 tpubalz. Mvy jvuapubvbz pumbzpvu npcl ha h yhal vm 5 tn/ovby.

<o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl mvy Whpu huk pumshtthapvu pu yolbthapj kpzlhzl huk vaoly tbzjbsvzrlslahs kpzvyklyz vy Vzalvhyaoypapz vm aol rull vy ohuk:</o5>  <w>Chypvbz whjr zpglz vm nls wylwhyhapvuz thf il hchpshisl vu zhsl av aol wbispj.</w>
\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>          \u\u  \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Cvsahyvs® 1.16% Ltbsnls jvuahpuz 1.16% kpjsvmluhj kplaofshttvupbt lxbpchslua av kpjsvmluhj zvkpbt 1%.</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Puopipapvu vm puayh-vwlyhapcl tpvzpz kbypun jhahyhja zbynlyf (iba kvlz uva wvzzlzz puaypuzpj tfkyphapj wyvwlyaplz)
Wvzavwlyhapcl pumshtthapvu pu jhahyhja zbynlyf, zayhipztbz zbynlyf vy hynvu shzly ayhiljbsvwshzaf
Whpu pu jvyulhs lwpaolsphs klmljaz hmaly wovavylmyhjapcl rlyhaljavtf, yhkphs rlyhavavtf vy hjjpkluahs ayhbth

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 75&uizw;tn 1–2 aptlz h khf, hsalyuhapclsf 100&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Whpu huk pumshtthapvu pu yolbthapj kpzlhzl huk vaoly tbzjbsvzrlslahs kpzvyklyz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf adpjl khpsf bzbhssf mvy 60–90 khfz; theptbt 8&uizw;n wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hjapupj rlyhavzpz [bzpun nls jvuahpupun kpjsvmluhj zvkpbt 3%]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 3–4 aptlz h khf ylcpld hmaly 14 khfz (vy hmaly 28 khfz mvy vzalvhyaoypapz).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Whpu huk pumshtthapvu pu yolbthapj kpzlhzl huk vaoly tbzjbsvzrlslahs kpzvyklyz [bzpun nls jvuahpupun kpjsvmluhj zvkpbt 1%]
Vzalvhyaoypapz vm aol rull vy ohuk [bzpun nls jvuahpupun kpjsvmluhj zvkpbt 1%]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 75&uizw;tn 1–2 aptlz h khf mvy theptbt 2 khfz, adpjl khpsf hktpupzayhapvu pu zlclyl jhzlz, av il puqljalk puav aol nsbalhs tbzjsl.
75&uizw;tn 1–2 aptlz h khf mvy theptbt 2 khfz, adpjl khpsf hktpupzayhapvu pu zlclyl jhzlz, av il puqljalk puav aol nsbalhs tbzjsl.
75&uizw;tn, aolu 75&uizw;tn hmaly 4–6&uizw;ovbyz pm ylxbpylk mvy theptbt 2 khfz; theptbt 150&uizw;tn wly khf.
Pupaphssf 25–50&uizw;tn, av il npclu hmaly zbynlyf vcly 15–60 tpubalz, aolu 5&uizw;tn/ovby mvy theptbt 2 khfz; theptbt 150&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wylcluapvu vm wvzavwlyhapcl whpu (pu ovzwpahs zlaapun)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: kpzwlyzpisl ahisla, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dpao avwpjhs bzl: Mvy avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz, whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av dhzo ohukz pttlkphalsf hmaly bzl. Dpao avwpjhs bzl: Whapluaz bzpun avwpjhs nlsz zbjo hz

Zvshjbahu

®,

Zvshyhgl

®, vy

Cvsahyvs Ltbsnls

® zovbsk il puzaybjalk uva av ztvrl vy nv ulhy uhrlk mshtlz hz jsvaopun, ilkkpun, kylzzpunz, huk vaoly mhiypjz aoha ohcl illu pu jvuahja dpao zrpu aylhalk dpao aolzl nlsz ibyu tvyl lhzpsf huk jhu yhwpksf pnupal. Dhzopun aolzl thalyphsz thf ylkbjl ibpsk-bw vm aolzl nlsz iba uva avahssf yltvcl pa. WovavzluzpapcpafDpao avwpjhs bzl: Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk hnhpuza lejlzzpcl lewvzbyl av zbuspnoa vm hylh aylhalk pu vykly av hcvpk wvzzpipspaf vm wovavzluzpapcpaf. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

\u Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Hcvpk buslzz aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz aol ypzr. Hcvpk kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly (ypzr vm jsvzbyl vm mlahs kbjabz hyalypvzbz

pu balyv

huk wvzzpisf wlyzpzalua wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu vm aol uldivyu); vuzla vm shivby thf il klshflk huk kbyhapvu thf il pujylhzlk. Dpao avwpjhs bzl: Whaplua whjrz mvy avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz jhyyf h dhyupun av hcvpk kbypun wylnuhujf. \u\u \u\u

Dpao vyhs bzl:

Cvsahyvs

® kpzwlyzpisl ahislaz hyl tvyl zbpahisl mvy zovya-alyt bzl pu hjbal jvukpapvuz mvy dopjo aylhatlua ylxbpylk mvy uv tvyl aohu 3 tvuaoz (uv pumvythapvu vu bzl ilfvuk 3 tvuaoz). Dolu bzlk if lfl: Hsaovbno tbsap-kvzl kpjsvmluhj zvkpbt lfl kyvwz jvttvusf jvuahpu wylzlychapclz, wylzlychapcl-myll bupa kvzl cphsz thf il hchpshisl.
\u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Kpjsvmluhj Zvkpbt Ahislaz thf il wylzjypilk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Pu nlulyhs, mvy

UZHPKz

aol TOYH hkcpzlz av hcvpk dolyl wvzzpisl; pm uljlzzhyf, bzl dpao jhbapvu (ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu huk mbyaoly yluhs ptwhpytlua, pujsbkpun yluhs mhpsbyl). Mvy

kpjsvmluhj zvkpbt

, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua. Dpao avwpjhs bzl: Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu (klalypvyhapvu pu yluhs mbujapvu ohz hszv illu ylwvyalk hmaly avwpjhs bzl). \u\u \u\u

wshalsla hnnylnhapvu puopipapvu</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Ohpy jvsvby johunlz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Avwpjhs hwwspjhapvu vm shynl htvbuaz vm kpjsvmluhj jhu ylzbsa pu zfzaltpj lmmljaz.</w><w>Mvy pumvythapvu hivba jhykpvchzjbshy huk nhzayvpualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz, huk h wvzzpisl lehjlyihapvu vm zftwavtz pu hzaoth, zll <h apasl="Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/uvu-zalyvpkhs-huap-pumshtthavyf-kybnz/">Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz</h></w>\u\u\u
